name: Lycah
description: Lycah - The Enchantress is an exciting game from the team behind the Thorne series that puts you in the role of Lycah, a young woman troubled by her past.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
